name: Dinesafe
headline: We crowdsource food safety reports & detect and prevent outbreaks.
description: We provides tools, data and systems to facilitate real-time insights, decluttering outbreak detection and enhancing risk mitigation. Our surveillance is used by industry, public heath and consumers globally.

# Food safety risk management solutions
Proactive protection for your business. All in one place. Powered by AI

Get weekly risk summary

## Trusted by industry leaders in food and public health
## DineSafe provides cutting-edge, intuitive, and holistic solutions that support businesses in managing risks, compliance, hazards, and customer engagement effectively and efficiently.
![Img header \(1\) 01](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/344ed461-2444-48ca-9d9e-17b635469d83?optimizer=gif)
##  Solutions 
Proactively handle your risks with our innovative platform
![Layer 1](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/fec25570-6566-4a4d-9117-d914c0d8cb3c?optimizer=gif)
### Risk monitoring
Stay ahead of food safety and operational risks, including foodborne illness, extreme weather, boil water notices, power outages, and more
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</risk-monitoring-solutions>)
![Features 1](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/3742ae58-a13d-4c6f-83fc-37b04dd69e59?optimizer=gif)
### Data analytics
Leverage DineSafe's secure, scalable platform with advanced analytics, AI, and machine learning to turn data into actionable insights and predictive intelligence, enhancing strategic decision-making and performance
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</data-analytics>)
![Features 5](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/e9dcf890-698e-47cf-829c-953d7423e078?optimizer=gif)
### Customer engagement
Turn your customer food safety concerns into trust-building opportunities. Significantly reduce business risk and improve your customer retention
[ Learn more  ](https://dinesafe.org/</customer-engagement>)
![Features 3](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/2b3800b6-6408-4f89-9e72-98f9220dc85a?optimizer=gif)
### Hazard reporting
Enhance safety and responsiveness, reduce business risks through real-time, field-based hazard reporting and critical event management
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</hazard-reporting>)
![Features 4](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/db85c568-5cde-4991-9144-a5882bca1ec9?optimizer=gif)
### Reputation management
Monitor, benchmark, and protect your brand reputation. Transform customer feedback into valuable insights
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</reputation-management>)
![Features 2](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/9dc79864-c492-4d56-b603-6884d5584966?optimizer=gif)
### Compliance support
Simplify multi-jurisdictional compliance with DineSafe's extensive health regulator database and interactive mapping
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</compliance-support>)
##  Use cases Our services, data, and capabilities tailored to address a range of use cases
### Restaurants
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</food-and-retail/>)
![Icon rest \(3\)](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/e816dc83-8df2-4980-8f06-130aa32f0378?optimizer=gif)
### Franchisee
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</food-and-retail/>)
![Icon franchisee2](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/70ac5f74-2096-4200-b52c-017a3ab82e4b?optimizer=gif)
### Food retail & Grocery
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</food-and-retail/>)
![Fi 12444878](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/a1917c6c-5cc2-411c-b2ec-d97be0c65d6c?optimizer=gif)
### Business Continuity
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</business-continuity>)
![Icon business](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/e7e67ede-a76b-4301-8818-e2df1be5022c?optimizer=gif)
### Customer care
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</customer-care>)
![Icon care \(2\)](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/de8e3db7-8888-4a92-ad87-52365638a8f8?optimizer=gif)
### Asset protection
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</asset-protection>)
![Icon asset \(4\)](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/378b6728-bd4b-4b89-9404-cef3223c9d7b?optimizer=gif)
### Quality assurance
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</quality-assurance>)
![Fi 5988477](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/6b553f6e-c97e-451f-94fd-f2c587a5a0d3?optimizer=gif)
### Iwaspoisoned.com
[ Learn more ](https://dinesafe.org/</iwaspoisoned>)
![Icon iwasp](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/79914cc3-167d-4c91-a37d-c32f3ed71fcd?optimizer=gif)
## Get ahead of risks with our complimentary insight reports 
A summary of business continuity & food safety risks customized for your brand and locations

## Access food safety insights from the #1 consumer food safety crowdsourcing platform
  * Real-time data
  * Early warning alerts re potential outbreaks
  * Facilitate customer care/recovery
  * Reduce headline risk


![Iwaspoisoned landing](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/183826b1-a9f2-42f5-a718-01d1a8594602?optimizer=gif)
  * [Learn more](https://dinesafe.org/</iwaspoisoned>)


## How it works
Enhancing risk control with personalized insights
  * 1
## Initiate data feed
Our risk monitoring solution gathers data from key locations such as storefronts and headquarters, aligning with your business's structure to provide insights for proactive management and excellence.
![Img feed map \(1\)](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/8a13e457-1a60-4445-ab4b-a5f0b1f150b1?optimizer=gif)
  * 2
## Tailored alert selection for your needs
We pinpoint key risks at each location, including health, safety, and compliance, offering specialized alerts for issues like foodborne illness, power outages, weather, and safety violations to safeguard your operations.
![Img alerts](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/2074243f-c986-4918-8aca-9bf26e735ac4?optimizer=gif)
  * 3
## Choose your metrics and analysis points
    * Performance metrics
    * Risk assessment
    * Forecast analysis
    * Recommendations
    * Trend analysis
![Img charts \(2\)](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/53c0f49b-e5bb-490a-8b80-6d2c0dbe6a38?optimizer=gif)
  * 4
## Personalized insight delivery
We customize the delivery of insights through channels like Email, SMS, App, or Map-Based reports, allowing you to set the distribution logic, specify recipients, and select report frequency to match your needs.
![Img insights](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/c55e1535-efdf-4ad0-ac81-88884433a618?optimizer=gif)
  * 5
## Customized summaries 
We collaborate to construct custom visual summaries of risk factors, reports, and action items, providing an intuitive overview tailored specifically to your needs and risk landscape.
![Img summary](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/6b3bb215-1ea7-4bf3-a389-f2b9b73623e1?optimizer=gif)
  * 6
## We are committed to ongoing improvement
We constantly refine your custom solution, using AI technology to keep pace with your business needs and industry trends.
![Img improve ai](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/063490f6-5cd4-410d-b8d6-22366037b168?optimizer=gif)


  * [Book a free demo](https://dinesafe.org/</demo>)


##  Why choose us 
Unique market data, expertise and technology - all in one place
  * ![Gears no text](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/d17ddf6a-5122-4554-827b-2eead6bad4cb?optimizer=gif)


  * ### 
![Icon why4](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/dd9b1fab-e21a-48f1-abda-6bf5a2543fee?optimizer=gif)
PROPRIETARY DATA 
Our exclusive relationship with iwaspoisoned.com, we have critical food safety insights, that no other platform can offer
  * ### 
![Icon why2](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/98748b2b-67cb-4265-8065-a7ae6d01393b?optimizer=gif)
EXPERTISE 
With years of experience in the field, DineSafe brings unmatched industry knowledge and insights
  * ### 
![Icon why56w](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/700a1f76-2512-4fab-b38f-61e8888a9a42?optimizer=gif)
TECHNOLOGY 
We harness the power of AI and Big Data to deliver real-time, actionable insights
  * ### 
![Icon why5](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/5f9b2817-06f8-40ac-8cb5-e7758f6aea14?optimizer=gif)
SIMPLICITY 
We provide solutions that require zero technical work on your part. Just seamless implementation and immediate value
  * ### 
![Icon why3](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/88bd2160-95d9-4e32-bcc0-06e7a68ebbb9?optimizer=gif)
SUPPORT 
We pride ourselves on our client-first approach, offering round-the-clock support for our platform and services

generated_description:
**DineSafe Overview**

Founded in 2016 and nestled in the vibrant ecosystem of New York, DineSafe is a Y Combinator Batch S18 startup dedicated to transforming food safety. Their mission is simple yet ambitious: they crowdsource food safety reports to detect and prevent outbreaks, ensuring that consumers, businesses, and public health officials have the timely data they need to mitigate risks.

**What They Do**

DineSafe provides a suite of tools and solutions designed for real-time insights into food safety. This includes:

- **Risk Monitoring**: Keeping watch for foodborne illnesses, extreme weather impacts, and other operational risks.
- **Data & Analytics**: Utilizing AI and machine learning to convert complex data into actionable insights for better decision-making.
- **Hazard Reporting**: Offering a system for real-time reporting of hazards directly from the field.
- **Compliance Support**: Helping businesses navigate complex regulatory environments with ease.
- **Customer Engagement**: Building trust with customers through responsive communication about food safety concerns.
- **Reputation Management**: Monitoring and enhancing brand reputation in relation to food safety feedback.

DineSafe serves a variety of clients, particularly in the **food and retail** sectors, ensuring their operations are safe and compliant while ultimately enhancing customer care and business continuity.

**Technology and Insights**

What sets DineSafe apart is its proprietary access to data from **iwaspoisoned.com**, which provides critical crowd-sourced food safety insights—something no other platform can deliver. Their use of advanced analytics and AI helps streamline risk management while simplifying complex decisions into digestible insights.

**Team and Growth**

With a small yet mighty team of six, led by Group Partner Nan, DineSafe is nimble and focused. Their growth trajectory since inception has positioned them as a trusted resource for food safety across industries and globally.

**Get Involved**

Curious to see how DineSafe can protect your business or enhance your consumer engagement in food safety? Their website (https://dinesafe.org) offers detailed resources, case studies, and the opportunity to schedule a demo to explore their platform in action. 

In a world where food safety is paramount, DineSafe isn’t just a tool; it’s a proactive partner in ensuring communities stay healthy and businesses thrive.
